name: GKTurnBasedMatchmakerViewController
desc: An interface that allows a player to invite other players to a turn-based match and automatch to fill any empty slots.

items.name: init(matchRequest: GKMatchRequest)
items.desc: Creates a matchmaker view controller for the local player to start inviting other players to a turn-based game.

items.name: var showExistingMatches: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the view controller shows existing matches.

items.name: var matchmakingMode: GKMatchmakingMode
items.desc: The mode that a multiplayer game uses to find players.

items.name: enum GKMatchmakingMode
items.desc: Possible modes that a multiplayer game uses to find matches.

items.name: var turnBasedMatchmakerDelegate: GKTurnBasedMatchmakerViewControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The object that handles turn-based matchmaker view controller changes.

items.name: protocol GKTurnBasedMatchmakerViewControllerDelegate
items.desc: A protocol that handles when the status of turn-based matchmaking changes.
